website_summaries.verdict: A mix of fun patterns and neutral designs make this mat a perfect fit for any decor.
pros: Reversible mat is covered in an adorable paw print pattern on one side, and neutral white on the other
Available in a range of sizes from 18 to 54 inches
Cushion is thick and soft to provide comfort throughout the day
Safe for machine wash and dry
cons: Bed is easy for diggers and chewers to rip up and remove stuffing

customer_reviews.title: My Golden Loves This Bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small one for my dog's kennel when he was a puppy. As he got bigger... I tried other beds & he chewed up all of them. So I took this small midwest quiet time bed and left it out for him & he would lay half his body on it. He's a 100 lb golden retriever. Very big dog. So I went on Amazon and saw that they made large versions of this bed & bought it for him. At first he was only using half the bed.. probably out of habit, then he realized he could fit his entire body on it. Excellent bed!
customer_reviews.author: Some Devil

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My dog never seemed comfortable in the back of my 2016 Golf even though I had an end pillow and blankets. I got this because it was everything I was looking for in a dog bed. It fits perfectly and my dog loves it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Misleading measurements.
customer_reviews.text: The Bed is misleading when it gives you the size...Before you click on a size, read the fine print as it gives you the actual size that you're clicking on. The 30 inch that you click on is actually 28.5 inches... Why don't they state in the first place that it's 28.5 inches. If I had known before hand, I would have gone with the 36 inch, which is actually 34 inches. State the real size!!! Now to find another bed from a different company!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppy as he outgrew his older bed. It is really beautiful, love the colors, soft, easy to wash and best thing is my puppy sometimes chews on his bed/blanket/toys and not a single strand came off of this bed. I have washed it multiple times till now and nothing has chnaged so basically great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jyoti Kushwaha

customer_reviews.title: Love at first Nap =)
customer_reviews.text: This came in on Wed afternoon and by that evening our 2 little guys were in heaven and passed out on it. It is very soft and looks great! Brought it home... threw it on our leather couch and after a couple sniffs they were fast asleep. We have a 1yr old pup and a 16 yr old senior who both just LOVE this bed. Going to get a couple more smaller ones for their crates and car.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M. Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Great crate mat, absolutely love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love this and it fits perfectly in the Petco Premium 2-Door Dog Crate, XX-Large, Black that we purchased for our 86 lb GSD, more importantly, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Squeek loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby loves this pet bed! It's made very well and it's soft. The size is perfect for my cat and I got the smallest one. Squeek likes to sit on it while I work on the computer so it's a perfect purchase and she is comfortable! It shipped right away and got delivered a day before originally said. Very pleased and recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaA

customer_reviews.title: It's very soft and comfortable and my dog hasn't chewed it up yet
customer_reviews.text: Chance, our dog, loves it. He goes into his crate just to sleep on it. It fits perfectly in a 36" by 23" crate (my own outside measurements), so its size is a little flexible, shall we say. It's very soft and comfortable and my dog hasn't chewed it up yet, which is a plus. Very comfortable and worth the couple extra bucks from the very cheapest dog beds on Amazon. Doesn't shed any fabric or fluff anywhere. It also looks nice in the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chambers

customer_reviews.title: 2inches SMALLER than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These so-called 24" Paw Print Pet Beds are 2" smaller than advertised and the ones I bought just 2 months ago from Chewy.com! They are advertised as 24", described as 23.5" and they are TAGGED from the manufacturer as 23", so they are not as advertised and sold. I would send them the heck back but I cut the tags off thinking I got what I ordered. They don't fit the crates and I will have to donate these and buy on Chewy.com again. What a waste, can't recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: capt. video

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very plush and soft and has good amount of cushion - however one snag of my dogs nail on the corner ripped it and its not useless. We had it for less then a day. I am not sure what is going on with quality control with MidWest - but it is definitely not the company it once were.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Irregular shape
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 35x21.5 one year ago and would've given it a 5 star had I reviewed at the time. It has been washed over a dozen times, fits perfectly in the crate. Jan '18 bought the exact same one again because I was so pleased with the original bed. However, as seen in the photo, the new bed is irregular in shape and nearly two inches narrower compared to the bed bought a year ago. I thought perhaps it just needs to be pressed down/used, no I measured the fabric and it significantly smaller. I'm very disappointed that it doesn't fill out the bottom of the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Ludovico

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I was impressed by the plush, color, etc. All was well until my dog peed on the pad, I washed it the following morning, but even after 2+ washes with an enzymatic detergent, I could still smell the pee. The super plush pad ended up NOT being an asset to keep this pad sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Menlo Park Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is not 42 inches
customer_reviews.text: This bed is okay quality and thick enough for my dog when she is in her crate. It doesn’t fit the crate well although it should since it is supposed to be 42 inches. I selected 42 inches but then when you look in the description it states it is 40 inches. How can the seller call 40 inches, 42 inches? I guess I will be much more cautious when ordering anything else on Amazon. This type of selling isn’t right!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My dog absolutely loves it... unbelievable how the dog can be attracted to it immediately out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves it... unbelievable how the dog can be attracted to it immediately out of the package. Note: I do not have PRIME since Amazon.com does NOT stand behind their BS mark-up service and have become WORSE since they started pushing it so much at delivering non PRIME items. This is the 2nd I've bought of these and the same reaction with every dog that sets foot on it ..... "Mine!" Build is good, packaging is good (usually comes rolled up but unrolls easily), and does not flake off. The print has yet to become stained or damaged even after heavy use. Best of all.... dog has stopped sleeping in my bed every night in favor of this.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have two huskies and they love to chew and destroy beds and toys. I had two different beds before finding this one. Needless to say the others ended up in the trash after cleaning pieces of them from around the house. They love this one and I have had it for months. Great purchase...and my babies love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft thick pet beds
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered probably six of these beds in different sizes. Dogs and cats love them! On the last order that I received yesterday one of the two beds had dirt in the plastic package and black marks on the beige fleece. I started a return on it and it just refunded my money. I really appreciate not having to send it back. I'm going to wash and disinfect it to use for an outside feral cat. I'm nervous that it might have been used and returned but I now suspect it was rough handling in the warehouse. Buy these with confidence. Mine don't chew but I'd think these would not work with chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Horsemom

customer_reviews.title: Very good because you can wash it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a lot of beds for him, none of them worked. This one though! He loves it so much! He doesn't use it when he sleeps, he uses it when he chews bones, or playing with toys. Sometimes he just lays down there. Very good because you can wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Vinnesa Gozali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how thick this crate bed is. At least 2 inches of plushy goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Smaller than what is stated
customer_reviews.text: Item is smaller than what is stated in the description. I ordered a 48" cushion and the product I received was 44". I have a Newfoundland, the big guy needs those 4 missing inches.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two wash cycles - less than two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted two normal wash cycles before the seam split open and all the stuffing came out. It also got bumpy and uneven. Sad because my dog loved it and it's super thick and soft. Bye-bye $35.
customer_reviews.author: Barkley

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bargain Bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my service dog to have a soft bed to use in my car, or bed. I have washed the bed several times, along with drying without the bed shedding or falling apart. I find this very well made, and can be used in a lot of different situation. If you are looking for a big bed, this is not in that category, this is more use for the kennel, car, or by your bed. A well made flat bed without a high price. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good price
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this mat 2 years ago and still using it! (Photo comparison) It did get a hole (I think where the tag was) but it doesn’t have a lot of stuffing to come out. And the dogs haven’t messed with that hole either. It is not a thick, soft bed but it is nice as a cushion so they aren’t resting on the floor. I put a blanket on top of it in the dog kennel. Plan on buying one more so I always have one available if one needs washing. They do take some time to dry
customer_reviews.author: M. Everard

customer_reviews.title: Shrunken bed. Great until we washed it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mat for our little guy's crate, and it was perfect until we put it in the washing machine. It's now 2/3rds its original size. We'll still use it, but what a disappointment! Pet owners need items they can wash. Dogs can get dirty! This was one of the few items that fit our 22" crate exactly, but now I won't be buying a second one. Blah.
customer_reviews.author: Botgirl

customer_reviews.title: Meh...OK.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking pad with adequate cushion. I wont be using it in the crate because if my dog gets too warm she can't push it aside like she does her current, more flexible, pad. So, it will be used on the floor where there are rugs for traction and extra cushion. What I don't like is the synthetic sheepskin (warm) side. This is the same material that many soft dog toys are made of so immediately the dog thought it was another chew toy and started in on it, pulling pieces of it off. So, for now I can't leave her with it unattended. A different material (or washable cover) would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Max says he loves it!  Woof, woof👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Max said this pad is very comfortable and fits in his crate perfectly. He sleeps on it every night and even goes in it during the day to nap. I have washed and dried it several times and it is holding up nicely. He has not chewed on it - he prefers furniture, shoes, hands, etc. ! Of course now that I have said that he will destroy it. Pad works great for him. I was going to take a pic of him in his crate but he wanted his bed instead and we don't force him in the crate - dogs rule. Lol
customer_reviews.author: NLM4501

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: When its in the floor for a bed they all try for this one! I rotate between kennels, beds on floor. This is a favorite bed/pad for the pups. I like the color and paw prints. Everything for the pups must pass our wash & dry test! It has held up over a year and looking good. It has had all bodily fluids and orange clay mud on it. Occasionally it would have to be washed twice if someone was sick on it, but still looking good. Thicker than most, and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfy bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a bed which had disintegrated in the sun. Have a wire crate on porch for my cats to enjoy the sun in. The backing was reduced to dust. The new one is wonderful. The cats love it. I guess I didn't really measure well as it is too long, but the width is perfect. I just folded up the ends in the crate to make it work like a bolstered bed. I will try to bring it in when it isn't being used as I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: ParkSDTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Machine washable is a big plus!
customer_reviews.text: Our 70 pound chocolate lab loves this bed! He sleeps on it every night and naps on it during the day. He occasionally will sleep on our area rug, but 95% of the time he is on this bed. I purchased because it is machine washable and so far it has held up well to being washed and dried. I vacuum right over it as well when I vacuum our area rug. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DeejN

customer_reviews.title: I've had this crate pad for about two years now ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this crate pad for about two years now and it's still very soft and very durable. My dog loves it! It also holds up very well after many washes. One thing to note, because the fleece side is actually more of a polyester material and I placed it in the dryer the fibers have kind of clumped together now. I don't mind since its still just as soft. Just be sure to tumble dry or air dry if you want to maintain the original fleece look. The blue side remains unchanged by the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I bough this bed for my german shepherd boy. It was for his relaxing bed after meal or play. It is very soft and keeps him warm. He did chew and pull out the two string that meant for hanging the bed after washing I guess, but not surprised because he is a puppy and learning. So far I love this bed and color. It fits great inside his big crate too. If I need more in the future, I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Splinter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pad
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. She's sleeping on it right now and not ready to wake up. She seems to be very comfortable on it. I use it in her crate where she spends the night lately since she has canine cognitive dysfunction, a.k.a. doggy dementia. Because of that I have to cover it with pads and a towel. Usually she stays dry during the night, but one time I woke up late and there was a mess. She had moved the protection away and peed on the pad. I washed it and air dried it. It was ready for the next night and was not deformed or anything. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Dalmolin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it did not measure up to size
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft, but I was disappointed and returned the 17 x 11 because the length only barely measured 16". It was for a crate, and would not serve the purpose for which it was intended. So be aware that this is smaller than anticipated. Other than that, it's a nice, soft pad for the money. Machine washable. But if you want it for a 17" long crate, you may want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerpaws

customer_reviews.title: House bunny loves her bed
customer_reviews.text: No idea if this is chew proof. My bunny isn’t a chewer. But she loves to lounge on this. Got it for a mattress for the baby doll IKEA beds. I got 18 inch which fits my animals but is small for the beds. Still happy with it. Got two. One for 3 lb house bunny. One for 11 lb cat. Soft, nice looking, light weight. Recommend! Helpful? Please click below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ParisUSA

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love it Also
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a second mat because our two cats were fighting over this one in the middle of the night. While there are many cat beds in our house, this one has become a favorite. While I know they are machine washable, I am still covering both with handsome towels. Not all cats are fastidious about their personal grooming. Both of mine are the 30 inch size
customer_reviews.author: T. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great - Glad I sized up!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is soft and my 3 month old doodle only chews a bit on it. She has taken to it quickly and enjoys chewing her bones or sleeping on it when we are in the living room. My only issue is that I ordered the 24 inch thinking she could grow into it for many months. She is about as long as it is when she lies down. Glad I decided to size up and not get her current length. She weighs 17 lbs and its just her size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rasor

customer_reviews.title: DO
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 hours :( Update 2-1-19 Threw it out !!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to a full thickness bed
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I had to give it a try - trusting my dog loving friends. My 11 year old 60 lb Portuguese Water Dog had one of those thin soft white mats in my home office near me. It was ok but Lucy deserved more than that. This came two hours ago and it took Lucy all of 2 minutes to fall in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picky kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sweet kitty to lay on while she was recovering from a rear leg amputation. For a cat who isn't a fan of beds or anything cat related (catnip/scratching posts), she LOVED this. She spends a lot of time laying on this at night near our bed so she can still be close without getting her wound bumped or kicked. She also makes biscuits on it which is adorable. So glad we got her something comfy she can call her own while she heals.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size and cushion for my small dogs crates. I have new Two yorkies (3 lb, 6 lb) and this fits perfectly in their crates. It’s got an excellent thickness to the cushion for them to lay on. I put a blanket over it just to ensure they wouldn’t chew on it and have had zero issues. At first I only bought one but once I received it and saw it fit so well in the carrier, I quickly went back and ordered the second one. Both dogs are very happy. Easy to wash and dry in the machines and use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy de Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved the bed and I was so happy with it until I had to wash it. My dog was sick so she had accident in crate. I washed off the really bad part and through it in the washer. I washed it twice and there was still “stuff” on the bed. I’m not a huge review writer but I bought three different kinds of dog beds at the same time and the other two washed up great, this is the only one that was an issue. Super disappointed because this bed was so great up to the point of getting it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful hopes

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the thickness of pad and super soft cover, however it is not true to size of 24x17. In fact it measured 21.5 x 16 - disappointed but don't want to bother sending it back. I guess they are hoping for that. Those missing 2.5 inches make it super loose in the crate, so I stuffed a rolled up towel into the gap. Bummer as I really wanted a nice fitting crate pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My dog has chewed up 4 beds before this one. I quit buying him beds for awhile because it was a waste of money. He likes to sneak and sleep on my couches and I don't care to be covered in dog hair daily, so i figured I would try again with a bed. We've had this one for about a month and no signs of him destroying it. I'm calling that a win. I got the 48" bed. My dog is an American Bulldog and about 80lbs for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Lona728

customer_reviews.title: No zippers!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly inside the crate. My dog has a special radar for any type of tag or zipper and will chew at them until the item is "dead". This bed has no zipper so she hasn't been able to rip it open and defluff, but I'm sure she could if she wanted to. Past zippered beds have lasted only days and this one is going on a month now with daily unsupervised use. It is fluffy enough to give some padding to lay on and I also throw in some old bath towels so she can nest without digging at the bed too much.
customer_reviews.author: A.luebsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Ok.... so I loved this bed. Nice and fluffy. BUT it’s so hard to clean even after it goes in the wash the residual of my dogs treats are still on it making it feel crusty and he does not want to lay on it. I did return it and my money was refunded. This would be good for dogs who just need to lay on it & do not play with toys that have ridges because they still to it.
customer_reviews.author: Draye

customer_reviews.title: All the furry ones love it.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was a little sceptical about how it would wear but It's still in great shape after multiple washings. We got it for Simba, our 16 year old Shepherd/Chow, who was having hip problems but didn't like the thicker pads. He loved this one so much he refused to share! Unfortunately, he passed away. Now the other dog and two cats share the pad. I vacuum it evert other day and wash it weekly and it has held up very well. I use hot water on the gentle cycle, dry it on low heat with tennis balls and it comes out clean, fluffy and ready for the furry ones to cuddle up together.
customer_reviews.author: Billi W.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive pad
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a short time, but so far so good. Arrived on time in good condition, no odor, dog approved. Both sides are similar type 'synthetic fur', softer than the typical bolster beds, and looks very nice. The pad is thicker than the bolster type crate pads, but not as thick as the 'pet beds' I've purchased. The 48" side is more than ample for 90# dog, even laid out. At 110#, it would be fine if he curls, but for a taller breed dog who sprawls, this would not be large enough.
customer_reviews.author: LadyExec

customer_reviews.title: Stanley (Beagle/Lab) mix loves it!  EASY TO WASH AND DRY!
customer_reviews.text: Description and photo of bed & crate mat are accurate. We had recently purchased a new crate because of our dogs anxiety issues and he was hesitant about using it. We placed this mat into the new crate and he immediately went in and laid down. He now goes into the crate to lay down randomly. Obviously he is comfortable with it. Our dog has chewed other mats to pieces that we have tried but has only bunched this one up to use as a pillow. I'm very pleased that this seems to have resolved the anxiety issues with the crate. Very easy to wash and dry, holds up well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the dogs and easy care for me
customer_reviews.text: I first bought one of these dog beds for our new puppy but I liked it so much that I bought two more to fit in our other inside dog kennels. They are built well and are nice and plush and the dogs seem to like laying and sleeping on them. I love that you can wash and dry them. I've washed and dried them all several times and they are holding up well and look the same as when I first got them. If that changes I will update this review but if there isn't an update then they are still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ziva approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go in my 90lbs GSD's kennel because I needed something sturdy enough that she couldn't squish it into a corner. This pad is smaller than her kennel (I knew that going in) so if you aren't into measuring, this pad fits the whole bottom of a medium kennel, not a large or extra large kennel. It is, however, big enough for my dog to lay on and be comfy. I could see where a puppy might be able to destroy this pad, but my girl is 3 now, and she's not a big chewer. It's thin enough to not make my dog hot, but thick enough to keep her off the hard kennel floor.
customer_reviews.author: ast219Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive dog and cat beds!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and great to use in dog crates. They are very soft and I even purchased a few small ones to put on the cat tree (had to purchase a second one because both cats wanted to lay on the spot with this bed). After a year or so they get pretty flat, either from use or from washing. Keep in mind I only put the dog in the crate maybe 30 minutes a day, so I do wish they would last a little longer. However, this is a great bed and I will just buy another one when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pad
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get another pad for my pups larger crate and, when I saw that Amazon had the same pad from his smaller crate, I got so happy. I love this pad and so does he. We've had the first one for a few years and although he took the stuffing out of a section during his puppy stage he still loves it. So happy to have found a second one. It's the perfect size for his crate.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves her new bed!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves her new bed!! She rarely wanted to go in her crate before and now she doesn't want to come out lol. My dad bought this for her as an early Christmas present and I'm so glad he did. It has two sides, one is for keeping cool during the summer and the other side is for keeping warm in the winter. It's really soft too. Definitely recommending this!! Excuse all of her toys lol
customer_reviews.author: Ginggiiee

customer_reviews.title: They didn't send as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have order two of these exact same ones in the 36" size. They have lasted and lasted with many washings. I passed them along to my daughter when I didn't need that size any longer. This was pictured exactly as those, with the paw prints. This is the XS size and looks completely different. The fabric is totally different. This a plush furry type of cover and I'm not sure how well it will wear. I may post again later if it holds up like the large ones I've had. I took send it back, but I'm going to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Noni102508

customer_reviews.title: Less laundry, score one for me and this product!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs ( I have three) sleep in crates at night. They are bed hogs, so we have crate them in order to get some sleep. They used to have previously used human pillows and sheets, but boy the laundry got out of hand. It's bad enough when you have to do change your bedding weekly. Now I just through these 3 in one load ( used to have two separate loads for their previous bedding options), and they spruce up like new. Also no one has chewed any holes or thought of it as a toy. Big win all around! Signed, one appreciative dog mama.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N. wife/mother/teacher

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this would work for what I wanted, which was to give my dog a little more of a cushion (bed) in part of his kennel. It worked perfect, it fit very well in the area I wanted it for and my dog loves it. I like the fact that it is machine washable and it has warmer and cooler sides.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good quality. The outer dimensions of her crate are approx. 28.5" x 42.5" and this bed fits it just right. I like it. More importantly, my dog likes it. Don't believe me? Check out the photo.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My 135 pound dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 135 pound lab/great dane mix. She loves the bed. We got the 48 inch. We don't have lots of space. So I just wanted something like a mat or rug she can sleep on instead of the hard floor. So I bought this to go on the floor at the end of our bed. It feels like a soft fuzzy blanket and gets her off the floor. But we are able to walk on it if we have to. PS.. Also she took right to it. She had no problems sleeping on it the first night.
customer_reviews.author: The Youngmans

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on a cat window perch!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if it is chew proof, because I use it for my cat. I use this because it fit nicely into my cats window perch. I like that it is double sided. One side is warmer than the other. It is soft and easy to clean. Very thick and sturdy. I recommend this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: GMSqueaky

customer_reviews.title: Approved by my dogs
customer_reviews.text: Approved by my dogs, which is the most important test. It's cover is soft, so it's probably not chew-proof (my dogs are old and past the chewing stage, so I have no way to test this). It arrived only a few days ago, so I haven't tried to wash it, but it claims to be machine washable. It's construction appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DogLover

customer_reviews.title: All of my dogs love these.
customer_reviews.text: I use these as crate pads and my dogs love them. I used to have two different kinds in two of the crates, and my dogs would choose to lay in the crate with this pad when they were roaming free in the house. Now we have them in all of the crates. I gave this four stars because when this crate pad is new it is very fluffy, but after washing and drying it loses a lot of that. My dogs don't seem to mind, though.
customer_reviews.author: CBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keeps too much filth very good as a flea nest.
customer_reviews.text: Because of the thick fur padding on one side, this pet bed is a very good flea nest. It is very thick and therefore very hard to wash. It keeps faulty odors and is very unsanitary. It can be used once but once it is filthy it gets pestilent and should be thrown away. The good things about it is that is made of good quality materials, it is very padded and comfortable but very unpractical to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: AL G

customer_reviews.title: The cats like it too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fleece mat for my older golden retriever who sometimes doesn't want to lay on one of his numerous dog beds, preferring instead a lower mat. It provides a bit of cushioning on the hard wood floors and gives him some traction when getting up. It wears well. He likes to dig into his beds and this has held up well. The cats like it too. I bought a smaller one for them. I've bought three so far for different areas of the house and would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: well worth the price .
customer_reviews.text: This is wife and daughter approved LOL . that is not an easy feat when a man shops solo . the chi puppy arrives in 3 days so its not puppy approved yet , but my adult chi actually went into the puppy pen i just set up and laid down on it . My 85 lb Anatolian went in and sniffed but she is bigger than the pen so no big deal .nice pad , nicer than i was expecting from my wife's reaction to it .its not super thick but for a small breed its perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Kingfish

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft/comfy
customer_reviews.text: This bed was the perfect size for my pup and for his crate. But it definitely doesn't feel very nice. The blue side is... ok, but not as plush and soft as I hoped it would be for my pup. The white side is just rough, not sure why I would ever use that side. My pup went strait to chewing it, rather than laying on it. That's not the brand's fault though. It really doesn't seem like it would clean very well, but I haven't tried it. Returning because the material is much tougher than I hoped it would be from the pictures. I'm just sure I can get my pup something nicer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates this bed
customer_reviews.text: I mean, there's nothing wrong with it I guess. But my dog hates it. It makes her itchy, it's flat, she tries to puff it up and it ends up folded over itself in the corner of her crate with her sleeping on the bare floor. Ordered a different bed that she loves. Gave this one to the cats.
customer_reviews.author: cerulean dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Shady Pricing
customer_reviews.text: This bed is gorgeous and seems to be good quality (have not washed it yet) and I would love to give it a 5 Star Rating but my issue is that I liked it so much that I tried to re-order a second one right after this one was delivered and they raised the price by $10! In a matter of 4 days? Does not seem right to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sharms

customer_reviews.title: Good value, dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bed for our Cairn Terrier. I can notice a slight difference on the cool side. He seems to like it too! He's getting older so I can speak to it's chew durability, he doesn't really do that anymore. It was a good price and fit our needs so I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in first wash
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good bed to go with my MidWest Crate. Unfortunately the seams came out the first time through the washing machine and the fuzzy outside is all matted. Definitely not washable. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice padding but thin enough to fit into a travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for mat training my beagle, and to use when waiting in dog class. This is thick enough to provide padding when laid over a concrete floor. It would not be chew proof although my beagle has not been inclined to chew it. It folds easily in half, and the medium size will fit in an average-sized shopping bag when folded. It's washable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: hate housework

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Updated April 2019: We've had this mat for over two years now. It's held up very well with our German Shepherd and Lab taking turns with it throughout every day and all night. It washes well in the washing machine too. This last wash - after two years - the seam at the end came un-sewn a little and I had to mend it which was not a big deal. I would highly recommend this mat. Original review: We've had this for several months now and both our dogs love it. It's used in the crate all the time and we've never had a problem with it. It vacuums well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, comfy pet mats!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great for my two cats who shed non-stop. Their fur doesn't seem to adhere to them as it does to most fabrics. The mats are soft and comfy and I shake them out daily but there is no clinging fur. They are machine washable and reversible too!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 for the and then liked them so much I ordered 3 more. My dogs are 11 yrs old and needed comfortable beds. Dogs love them and they are not as thin as what they appear in sale post. My dogs also like to scratch their beds before they lay down and usually tear them.... notit these though. They hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: sarah poppen

customer_reviews.title: Puppy approved!
customer_reviews.text: my puppy LOVES this bed! I bought the 24 inch one, thinking it was going to be too big for her but it's perfect size! its great that is has both a cool side and warm side. i just lay a blanket on top of it to tuck her in, so she goes under the blanket and waits until i tuck her in. heavily considering getting another one for the BF's dog as well!
customer_reviews.author: steph iTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fleece side up for us!
customer_reviews.text: This pad has worked well for my doodle. The funny thing is I always put it fleece side up not as intended with blue side up. I was buying a second one for another crate and noticed this. So the next night I turned it in his crate. Then I heard all kind of movement and growling from the crate. He was trying his hardest to flip it over! Needles to say we are fleece side up again. I have washed it many many times and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The seams have come apart in two places after just a couple months and a few washes. Super disappointed. The stuffing is now exposed and I won't be able to put it in the wash. I decided to pay a bit more for this expecting better quality and longer life, maybe I got a bad one. Other than the bad seams I did like the mat, but might as well go back to the cheaper ones that lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good, but not sure how durable it is.
customer_reviews.text: I've had/used this less than a week. I like how soft it is, but not very confident about its durability. Already see "tufts" coming off of it. Much prefer the blue side to the white side, but nice to have that choice. One rather bad thing I've already noticed about it, is, it slides around in the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Made VERY well and extremely soft!! Pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: This reversible pet bed is AWESOME!! We went ahead and gave our dog & cat their Christmas present early and they love it! It’s very thick and soft. Our dog likes to bite and chew and he TRIED, but the quality and the stitching is excellent! It’s also a lot bigger than we expected! As we have tile floors, it’s also nice to be lap free of our pets!! We almost couldn’t believe it when we caught them sleeping on it...together!! Wow! Super glad we made this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Y. - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my cute little puppy loves his little bed. It is very soft and you can wash and dry machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jime Verbel

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My nine month old puppy was shredding beds, so I decided to try this. It has been great! It fits the crate, and is very durable. She has not tried to chew it or pull the stuffing out. It comes with loops on the end to fasten to the crate. I was afraid they would be a gateway to chewing, so I cut them off. Now, if she runs into the crate, the bed slides. Still think I would cut them off. Washed and dried well, too. Great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Heather HS

customer_reviews.title: These pads are all I buy - washable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Put them in your washer and dryer. They wash over and over again and stay fluffy for a year or so. This is all we buy, because I can't have anything where only the cover washes....they may go a little flat after a time, a year or so, but are resasonably priced enough we can replace. If you get the very large size they are a little tough in the washer unless it's all by itself. They dry wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can throw it in the washer without zipping out any pad. But it exudes some kind of a dark stain that is stained not only itself but my Hugglehounds pads that I once washed with it . That's kind of a dealbreaker to me. My dog likes this in the HuggleHounds equally, so I ordered another HuggleHound and this is going to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: tbyg

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I don't think it would be very chew proof for a hard chewer, but it's nice and thick and very soft. I worried it would fall apart in the wash, but it washed beautifully. I'm buying a second one. Fits nicely in the small Midwest crate!
customer_reviews.author: Dharlee

customer_reviews.title: Small But Mighty
customer_reviews.text: This is a small bed but perfect for what I needed. I bought a booster car seat for my Enzo and it had zero support in the bottom. I bought this and it fit perfect in it and saved the day. Now Enzo can ride in fomfort. It keeps the seat opened uo nicely so it is not caving in on itself.
customer_reviews.author: TheZebra

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size larger than needed
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine. I’ve only had it for about three weeks but I’ve washed about 15 times. We have a dog with severe separation anxiety and he drools when we leave. Therefore we follow the washing instructions and make sure we dry it on law heat. It washes fine on delicate but it has shrunk about 4 inches so now it’s almost too small for our 36” crate. Do yourselves a favor and buy a size larger than you need if you plan on washing and drying regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Firedog

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and washable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crate pad! It’s soft and has a decent bit of padding. I use this with my Great Danes extra large crate and it fit perfectly. I also use it in my car to cushion her area in the back seat. It’s very washable!!! She’s had accident on it as a puppy and it’s been washed and dried oodles of times and it’s still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Fits the kennel but it is very thin. It will not provide any cushion for your pet. We have it in there just to keep a layer between dog and bottom of kennel. If you are looking for something more like a foam bed/pillow this will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It took her a while...
customer_reviews.text: It took our cat Mo a while to agree that this might be a useful product. But after a couple weeks of turning up her nose, she has now decided it is okay, and chooses to sleep there often. Mo is a rescued feral cat, of the standard tabby design, and weighs 14 pounds. She fits very well, whether curled up or stretched out. I'm thinking of getting another one for her other sleeping spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicolai

customer_reviews.title: Soft and flat
customer_reviews.text: Nice and plush soft without being too thick. My dog is a recent rear amputee and needed something flat but soft and comfortable. He seems to really like it and doesn’t mind sharing with the little one. It definitely isn’t chew proof
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: Paw Print Bed in Blue and White
customer_reviews.text: I now own 5 of these beds. I have two size crates for my small dog, one for night sleeping (it is in our bedroom) and one by the door that he will stay in while I go out. I keep extras for each one so that I can wash them every week. They have short fur on one side and the other side is sherpa. They wash well and stay fresh. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good for surgery recovery 12 weeks bed rest
customer_reviews.text: My dog was comfortable and I feel like she could easily get up from this bed. It is soft and thick but not so much that a dog has a hard time getting out. After surgery recovery I dont know but that she can easily chew it if bored in her crate.
customer_reviews.author: TF Broadway

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog chews EVERYTHING! The main reason we have to crate her when we are not home. I purchased this pet bed fully expecting it to last maybe if I was lucky a week or two. She's chewed every blanket, and/or bed that we put in her crate so I didn't have high hopes for this product. But after several weeks of use, it is still intact! I am so happy with this product. It gives her a bit of comfort and for some odd reason, it doesn't incite her to chew it to pieces! I would highly recommend the purchase of this product to anyone who crates their dog.
customer_reviews.author: JanP

customer_reviews.title: Washes well and my puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a puppy. Important that it can be washed and did not want to spend a lot of money in case the pup chewed it. The pup loved it, crawling onto it as I remove it from the bag. My pup has not tried to chew it. He loves this bed. It's holding up to twice weekly washing and drying very well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Adorable/Very soft bed!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft (especially the blue paw print side) bed. I have a six pound (15 week) shih zhu puppy, and the 18” pad is a little too small. The 18” would be perfect for a tea cup dog or tiny newborn puppy. I plan on getting the next size up (or even two sizes up to give her plenty of room). I also love that it can be washed in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: BRat

customer_reviews.title: ... side keeps shedding pills of fabric because my dogs love to dig into their beds
customer_reviews.text: Although the sherpa side keeps shedding pills of fabric because my dogs love to dig into their beds, overall this pet bed is durable, easy to clean, and super fluffy after each wash. Definitely the best pet bed I've ever bought.. and I definitely made the mistake of buying fancy $50 pet beds that were hard to wash. Its finally nice to learn that a a machine washable pet bed has made me soooooo happy. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: BeGreen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and washable! We’ve had these matts almost 2 years now and the dogs drag them out of their kennels around the kitchen to lay on. They’ve been washed over a dozen times and are just now starting to tear, and that’s because one of the dogs likes to nest. For the price and quality well definitely be buying again when it’s time to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: 3andahalf

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This has ended up to be a decent dog bed for our 40lb border collie. The padding is fine for the price. We had an extra piece of Gorilla rug pad, so that's under it for additional padding. Easy to clean and still looks nice a year later.
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer in FL

customer_reviews.title: Easily Destroyed
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a crate mat that would hopefully take a while for our anxious dog to destroy. He started to tear off parts of this bed within one day of placing it in his crate. Needless to say, this mat is now in our other dogs crate and he is enjoying it. It is fairly soft and would recommend only for dogs that are not prone to chewing and destroying their mats/beds.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Not What It Looks Like
customer_reviews.text: Beware: This is a puffy, flimsy pad. I have bought many pads that look like this that have lasted for years. This is two light pieces of soft material sewn together with thin thread and filled with a little bit of fiber foam. DO NOT BUY. This is a "look alike" to the ones that are a thick piece of cushy material that do not come apart no matter how much your dog chews. I would return but the dogs took the stitching out the first night and rendered it a mess the second. I would like my money back !!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bed and is thicker than most mats
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a mat that came with a dog bed. It's a good bed and is thicker than most mats. Although my dog didn't like the side with the paw prints because it wasn't soft enough, but she likes the other side. What I don't like is that the side she like is lighly colored and get dirty quick. It's washable and doesn't shed at all when machine washed. So it's not a huge problem but i do think it will end up being discolored and dirty looking
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Have these in two sizes in three crates for three dogs. They are chewers and typically go about destroying anything with fuzz/padding in them (dachshunds). These are easy to wash. My dogs tend to prefer the "wool" side vs the blue "cool" side - we tried it out and they literally flipped them in their crates LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Asand

product_meta.title: MidWest Homes for Pets Reversible Paw Print Pet Bed in Blue/White, Dog Bed Measures
product_meta.description: Size:18-InchIf you want to spoil your best friend (whether they be a dog or a cat...), the fun, over-stuffed QuiteTime Reversible Paw Print Pet Bed by MidWest Homes for Pets is the perfect pet bed for you! Each comfortable pet bed is available in multiple sizes that are perfectly suited for almost any breed of dog or cat (18” up to 54” sizes available). The Reversible Paw Print dog beds & cat beds feature a blue top with whimsical paw prints and a neutral cream fleece bottom. These cozy pet beds are machine washable / dryer safe and are sized to fit inside most standard folding metal dog crates creating a comfortable and desired location for your dog or cat to relax. MidWest Homes for Pets stands behind the quality of our products with a 1-Year Manufacturer’s Warranty. If you have any questions regarding our dog beds or cat beds our customer service department would be glad to help you. MidWest customer service can be contacted at: 1-800-428-8560, available 9:00 AM – 4:00 PM, Monday – Friday EST.
feature_bullets: Comfortable reversible pet bed, blue & cream w/ paw print pattern | Pet bed fits 18" long metal dog crates
Pet bed measures 17L x 11W x 1.5H & is ideal for "Tiny Breed" dogs & cats weighing up to 6 lbs | Not recommended for excessive chewers
Ultra-soft synthetic fur reversible (blue paw print top & fleece bottom) pet bed
When used w/ a dog crate the pet bed creates a cozy den enviroment further enticing your dog to use their pet home
Easy maintenace, machine washable / dryer safe pet (dog or cat) bed, includes 1-year Manufacturer's Warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
